prompt: Create a map view page with a full-screen interactive map as the main content. Include a top app bar titled 'Explore Map' with a white background, black text, and a back arrow icon on the left for navigation. Place a floating action button in the bottom-right corner with a GPS icon for locating the userâ€™s current position; use a vibrant orange color (Colors.orange) for the button with a white icon. The map should fill the entire screen below the app bar, with a subtle grey border (2px width) around it. Apply Material Design principles with a clean, minimalistic aesthetic. Ensure the map container has a light grey background (Colors.grey[200]) to indicate the map area.
